features.EOS: 01 is an earth observation satellite, intended for applications in agriculture, forestry and disaster management support. प्रमोचक राकेट / Launch Vehicle: PSLV-C49/EOS-01 उपग्रह का प्रकार / Type of Satellite: Earth Observation निर्माता / Manufacturer: ISRO स्‍वामी / Owner: ISRO अनुप्रयोग / Application: Disaster Management System Earth Observation कक्षा का प्रकार / Orbit Type: LEO (Low Earth Orbit) More Details PSLV-C49/EOS-01 EOS-01 Brochure PDF - 3.58 MB Gallery Launch of PSLV-C49/EOS-01 Lift off and Onboard Camera View of PSLV-C49/EOS-01 Launch Radial Rib Antena deployment of Earth Observation Satellite(EOS-01) as observed by onboard cameras
